mutants.code:
def reverse_words(message):
    words = message.split('')
    reversed_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    new_message = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return new_message

    words = message.split(' ')
    reversed_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    new_message = ''.join(reversed_words)
    return new_message

def reverse_words(message):
    words = message.split(' ')
    reversed_words = [word[::+1] for word in words]
    new_message = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return new_message

def reverse_words(message):
    words = message.split(' ')

    new_message = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return new_message

def reverse_words(message):
    words = message.split(' ')
    reversed_words = [word[::--1] for word in words]
    new_message = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return new_message
